comments.body: Hmm, don't know what to do about this one. It's now included when creating the recipe through conda skeleton cran ðŸ˜•
you can just add this one-liner with `license_file:`?

@MathiasHaudgaard Here's how I was advised to handle the license for R packages that are ambiguous about the GPL version:

https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/4676/files#diff-ab236354f787c30256ad43a827c41f18R42

```
about:
  license: GPL-2.0 and GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'  # [unix]
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}\R\share\licenses\GPL-3'  # [win]
```
